import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { CoinsPriceContext, CoinsPriceProvider } from './PriceCoins.js'; import { PriceChangeContext, PriceChangeProvider } from './PriceChange.js'; import './App.css' import btc from './images/btc.png' import eth from './images/eth.png' import bnb from './images/bnb.png' import ada from './images/ada.png' import xrp from './images/xrp.png' import ltc from './images/ltc.png' const images = [ btc, eth, bnb, ada, xrp, ]; function App() { const [currentImage, setCurrentImage] = useState(0); const CoinsPriceProvider = useContext(CoinsPriceContext); const PriceChangeProvider = useContext(PriceChangeContext); useEffect(() => { setInterval(() => { setCurrentImage((currentImage + 1) % images.length); }, 10000); }, [currentImage]); const getPriceChangeColor = priceChange => { if (priceChange >= 0) { return { color: 'green' }; } else { return { color: 'red' }; } }; return (

Crypto Tracker

Name

Price

24h%

BTC

$ {CoinsPriceProvider.btcPrice}

0 ? 'green' : 'red', textAlign: 'right' }}> {PriceChangeProvider.btcPriceChange > 0 ? '+' : ''}{(PriceChangeProvider.btcPriceChange * 1).toFixed(2)}%

ETH

$ {CoinsPriceProvider.ethPrice}

0 ? 'green' : 'red', textAlign: 'right' }}> {PriceChangeProvider.ethPriceChange > 0 ? '+' : ''}{(PriceChangeProvider.ethPriceChange * 1).toFixed(2)}%

BNB

$ {CoinsPriceProvider.bnbPrice}

0 ? 'green' : 'red', textAlign: 'right' }}> {PriceChangeProvider.bnbPriceChange > 0 ? '+' : ''}{(PriceChangeProvider.bnbPriceChange * 1).toFixed(2)}%

ADA

$ {CoinsPriceProvider.adaPrice}

0 ? 'green' : 'red', textAlign: 'right' }}> {PriceChangeProvider.adaPriceChange > 0 ? '+' : ''}{(PriceChangeProvider.adaPriceChange * 1).toFixed(2)}%

XRP

$ {CoinsPriceProvider.xrpPrice}

0 ? 'green' : 'red', textAlign: 'right' }}> {PriceChangeProvider.xrpPriceChange > 0 ? '+' : ''}{(PriceChangeProvider.xrpPriceChange * 1).toFixed(2)}%

LTC

$ {CoinsPriceProvider.ltcPrice}

0 ? 'green' : 'red', textAlign: 'right' }}> {PriceChangeProvider.ltcPriceChange > 0 ? '+' : ''}{(PriceChangeProvider.ltcPriceChange * 1).toFixed(2)}%

); } export default () => ( ); //
